name: Kompakt-Anlage für Flaschenbefüllung ohne Behälter
description:
in einem Standaschaltschrank (H=2000mm,B=600mm, T=600mm) 
FAS 936451 montiert,
Eingang Flansch DN 25 PN 40
Ausgang Flansch DN 25 PN 40 
Ausblaseleitung Flansch DN 15
bestehend aus:

- FAS 230766
Electronic Filling scale WAER100ex/e for LPG
- Type: WAER100ex/e
- Execution: stand alone

- Country of arrival: EUROPE

- Filling head: PSA930, manual for "F" type valves 
- Medium: LPG
- Surface: powder-coated, orange
- Additional equipment:

- Application area: Ex-Area Zone 1
- Internal memory: to save the last 5000 operations
- Working temperatures: -10°C to +40°C
- Resolution: 100g
- Tare weight: max. 50kg
- Filling weight: max. 50kg
- LPG-Connection: AG W21.8 x 1/14'' left
- Power supply: 230V / 50-60 Hz

- Filling scale calibrated, ready for operation, with factory certificate
